title: Drawing, "Oil lamp", 1810–25
medium: Pencil and brown wash on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle. Lamp ornamented with three standing female nudes. Pencil framing lines. A, B, C pasted together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oil lamp", 1810–25.
1810–25. Pencil and brown wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3252-b.
